description.0: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

0.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>40%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

1.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>50%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

2.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>60%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

3.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>70%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

4.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>80%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
